Title: AI Challengers | Adecco: Revolutionizing Recruitment- AI-Powered Approach
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Caroline Basyn, Chief Digital and Information Officer at the Adecco Group shares how their HR services business is taking an AI first skills approach to provide their recruiters and candidates with the necessary AI tools and skills to combine tech and talent to drive innovation and thrive in an AI-driven future.
